languages.text: {n}Он нервно сглатывает и испуганно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, молю, не спрашивайте о таком! Я не могу выдать моих братьев! Со мной покончено, но остальные... Это предательство!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Он нервно сглатывает и испуганно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Ваше Благородие, молю, не спрашивайте о таком! Я не могу выдать моих братьев! Со мной покончено, но остальные... Это предательство!"

languages.text: {n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"
languages.original_text: {n}Он нервно сглатывает и испуганно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, молю, не спрашивайте о таком! Я не могу выдать моих братьев! Со мной покончено, но остальные... Это предательство!"

traits.locale_text: {n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"

{n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"

{n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"

{n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"

languages.text: {n}少年はビクビクしながらつばを飲み込むと、不安そうにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「陛下、お願いです、それは聞かないでください！他の人を売るわけにはいきません！僕はもうおしまいだけど、みんなは…みんなを裏切りたくないんです！」
languages.original_text: {n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}少年はビクビクしながらつばを飲み込むと、不安そうにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「陛下、お願いです、それは聞かないでください！他の人を売るわけにはいきません！僕はもうおしまいだけど、みんなは…みんなを裏切りたくないんです！」

languages.text: {n}他紧张地咽了口唾沫，恐惧地看着你。{/n}“大人，我求求您，别问我这个问题！我不能出卖我的弟兄们！我已经完蛋了，但其他人……我不会出卖他们！”
languages.original_text: {n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他紧张地咽了口唾沫，恐惧地看着你。{/n}“大人，我求求您，别问我这个问题！我不能出卖我的弟兄们！我已经完蛋了，但其他人……我不会出卖他们！”

languages.text: {n}El muchacho traga saliva nervioso y te mira con pánico.{/n} «{mf|Milord|Milady}, se lo ruego, ¡no me pregunte eso! ¡No puedo vender a mis hermanos! Yo ya no tengo salvación, pero los demás... ¡No pienso traicionarlos!».
languages.original_text: {n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El muchacho traga saliva nervioso y te mira con pánico.{/n} «{mf|Milord|Milady}, se lo ruego, ¡no me pregunte eso! ¡No puedo vender a mis hermanos! Yo ya no tengo salvación, pero los demás... ¡No pienso traicionarlos!».

languages.text: {n}Er schluckt nervös und sieht dich angsterfüllt an.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich flehe Euch an, fragt mich das nicht! Ich kann meine Brüder nicht verraten! Für mich ist alles vorbei, aber die anderen ... Ich werde sie nicht verraten!"
languages.original_text: {n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er schluckt nervös und sieht dich angsterfüllt an.{/n}Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich flehe Euch an, fragt mich das nicht! Ich kann meine Brüder nicht verraten! Für mich ist alles vorbei, aber die anderen ... Ich werde sie nicht verraten!"

languages.text: {n}Il déglutit nerveusement et vous lance un regard apeuré.{/n} « Je vous en supplie, Votre Seigneurie, me demandez pas ça ! Je peux pas trahir mes frères ! Je sais que je suis fichu, mais les autres, je les trahirai jamais ! »
languages.original_text: {n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il déglutit nerveusement et vous lance un regard apeuré.{/n} « Je vous en supplie, Votre Seigneurie, me demandez pas ça ! Je peux pas trahir mes frères ! Je sais que je suis fichu, mais les autres, je les trahirai jamais ! »

languages.text: {n}Çocuk gergince yutkunuyor ve sana korkuyla bakıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, size yalvarırım bana bunu sormayın! Kardeşlerimi satamam! Benim işim bitti ama ötekiler... Onlara ihanet edemem!"
languages.original_text: {n}He swallows nervously and looks at you with fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg you, don't ask me that! I can't sell out my brethren! It's over for me, but the others... I won't betray them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Çocuk gergince yutkunuyor ve sana korkuyla bakıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, size yalvarırım bana bunu sormayın! Kardeşlerimi satamam! Benim işim bitti ama ötekiler... Onlara ihanet edemem!"
